item.title: Family Tree
item.description: graph LR toshiro -- sinichi take -- sinichi toshiro -- hanae take -- hanae

item.title: Laravel Tutorial
item.description: Laravel Tutorial https://qiita.com/sano1202/items/6021856b70e4f8d3dc3d s- http://localhost:10080/ Create New Project: feature/lsapp ref: https://github.com/bradtraversy/lsapp 1$ artisan --version 2Laravel Framework 7.8.1 3 4$ diff .env-example .env-lsapp 51,2c1,2 6< #COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=myproject 7< PROJECT_PATH=./src 8--- 9> COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=lsapp 10> PROJECT_PATH=./src-lsapp 114a5 12> APP_NAME=LSAPP 13 14$ make create-project 15docker-compose up -d --build 16docker-compose exec app composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel . 17docker-compose exec app composer require predis/predis 18sudo chown -R tkondoh:tkondoh ./src-lsapp 19 20$ make ps 21docker-compose ps 22 Name Command State Ports 23------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 24lsapp_app_1 docker-php-entrypoint php-fpm Up 0.

item.title: Laravel Setup
item.description: Laravel-v6 setup on docker refs: https://qiita.com/ucan-lab/items/17c806973e69792ada99#docker%E7%92%B0%E5%A2%83%E3%82%92%E6%A7%8B%E7%AF%89%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B spec: nginx mysql phpmyadmin node redis mailhog Setup files 1$ cd work-github 2$ git clone git@github.com:tkondoh1022/laravel-v6.git 3 4$ cd laravel-v6 5$ tree . 6. 7├── LICENSE 8├── Makefile 9├── README.md 10├── docker 11│ ├── ash 12│ │ ├── aliases.sh 13│ │ └── color_prompt.sh 14│ ├── mysql 15│ │ └── my.cnf 16│ ├── nginx 17│ │ └── default.conf 18│ └── php 19│ ├── Dockerfile 20│ ├── php.

item.title: Cakephp Tutrial
item.description: Note phpmyadmin: http://localhost:8888/db_structure.php?server=1&db=my_app Sample https://programming.best/cakephp-controller-sample-2/ bake https://www.sejuku.net/blog/26423 $ make phpfpm /var/www/html # cd sample /var/www/html # ./bin/cake bake controller foo Creta database https://book.cakephp.org/3/ja/tutorials-and-examples/cms/database.html Create database using phpmyadmin.

item.title: Cakephp Setup
item.description: refs: https://qiita.com/km42428/items/df1d0a1eefddcf771dfa Setup 1$ cd ~/work-github/ 2$ git clone https://github.com/km42428/docker-cakephp3-template.git cakephp3 3$ cd cakephp3 4$ tree . | less 5. 6`-- docker-cakephp3-template 7 |-- LICENSE 8 |-- README.md 9 |-- data 10 | |-- htdocs 11 | | `-- Dockerfile 12 | |-- mysql 13 | | |-- Dockerfile 14 | | `-- db 15 | |-- nginx 16 | | `-- conf 17 | | |-- conf.d 18 | | | `-- default.

item.title: Setup blog
item.description: I made my blog site with Hugo and easy-hugo. https://www.ted027.com/post/hugo/ SPEC. url: https://tkondoh1022.github.io os: ubuntu18.04 spacemace and easy-hugo SETUP Install latest Hugo 1$ sudo snap install hugo --channel=extended 2$ sudo ln -s /sbin/hugo /usr/bin/hugo Setup GitHub Make two repos blog tkondoh1022.github.io Set new site and first post 1$ cd ~/work-github 2$ hugo new site blog 3$ cd blog 4$ cd theme 5$ git clone https://github.
